thread.title: MOVES-AIG names Mouri chief auditor; DeMaio to be global COO, general insurance

title: MOVES-AIG names Mouri chief auditor; DeMaio to be global COO, general insurance

organizations.name: reuters) - u.s insurer american international group

text: March 1, 2018 / 3:12 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago MOVES-AIG names Mouri chief auditor; DeMaio to be global COO, general insurance Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 1 (Reuters) - U.S Insurer American International Group said on Thursday it would appoint Naohiro Mouri as its chief auditor replacing Donna DeMaio, who is taking up the role of global chief operating officer, general insurance. Mouri joined AIG in 2015 and previously held the position of senior managing director of Asia Pacific Internal Audit. Both appointments are effective on March 15. (Reporting by Akshara P in Bengaluru)
